title: Trump Considers Building a Military Base in Gaza as Peace Plans Clash With Reality
summary_full: Israeli strikes on Gaza have killed about 600 people since a cease-fire began, according to health officials in the territory. Many displaced Palestinians are still living in tents. And there are some 60 million tons of war debris to be cleared.
